desc: Virginia Chestnuts in Nelson Country VA.To ensure freshness, we pick chestnuts twice a day. They are immediately cleaned, weighed and put into cold storage.

layout.text:
It's late summer and we have chestnuts growing and maturing. Our trees are not heavy producers this year but we're grateful for what we have.
Pick-your-own starts on September 24. The full schedule will be posted shortly. New this season is a pick-your-own day on Wednesday, for those who's weekend is committed.
COMING UP
Sept-Oct: Pick your own
Oct 29: Chestnut School
We'll be hosting the annual chestnut school on October 29th for those interested in commercial chestnut orchards. Apologies for missing the July planned date.
Stay safe and we hope to see you soon.
